name: peccary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an animal that looks similar to a pig, found in the southwestern US and in Central and South America: Nicaragua's fauna includes mammals such as pumas, jaguars, various monkeys, deer, and peccaries. The big game that made up most of the protein in the diet of the Embera people - the tapir, the collared peccary, the white-lipped peccary - is gone.
More examplesFewer examplesWhole jaws of deer and peccary were occasionally found.Visitors will encounter mountain lions perched on a ledge and peccaries rooting about on the ground.Seeds under leaf litter are more accessible to other seed predators, such as peccaries and insects.
